title: राजस्थान रॉयल्स
summary: राजस्थान रॉयल्स (संक्षिप्त रूप में आरआर) इंडियन प्रीमियर लीग में खेलने वाली राजस्थान के जयपुर आधारित एक फ्रेंचाइजी क्रिकेट टीम है।

image.license: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 2.0 Generic license.

value.label: The Sawai Mansingh Stadium is a cricket stadium in Jaipur, Rajasthan, India. It was built during the reign of Raja Sawai Man Singh II who was also known as SMS, therefore the name is frequently shortened to SMS Stadium. As of July 2013, the stadium and grounds could be toured using Google Street View.

image.license: This file is made available under the Creative Commons CC0 1.0 Universal Public Domain Dedication.

value.label: The Rajasthan Royals became the winner of the first IPL tournament, when they defeated the Chennai Super Kings by 3 wickets in the final.
The Royals failed to make it to the semifinals after losing their last two matches against Delhi Daredevils and Kolkata Knight Riders.

The Rajasthan Royals, and the Kings XI Punjab were temporarily ejected from the league due to issues with their unreported ownership changes. The teams were reinstated with involvement from the High Court.

Steve Smith made a comeback to IPL  after he was banned by BCCI to participate in 2018 season due to Australian ball-tampering controversy. Ajinkya Rahane retained his captaincy at the start of the season, however,  Steve Smith returned to the captaincy after poor results.

Steven Peter Devereux Smith is an Australian international cricketer and former captain of the Australian national team. On 30 December 2017, he reached a Test batting rating of 947, the second-highest of all time.

image.license: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 2.0 Generic license.

value.label: Shane Warne played in the first four seasons (2008-2011) of the Indian Premier League for the Rajasthan Royals, where he played the roles of both captain and coach.

image.license: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution 2.0 Generic license.

value.label: Rahul Dravid has faced 31258 balls, which is the highest number of balls faced by any player in test cricket.

image.license: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 2.0 Generic license.

value.label: Ajinkya Rahane is currently the Captain of the Indian cricket team in Test cricket.
Captained by Shane Warne, Rajasthan Royals finished winners in the IPL and qualified for the champions league T20.
Shane Watson was named player of the series in the 2013 Indian Premier League.
Rajasthan Royals finished 3rd in the 2013 IPL
